metadata.title: Sttok for Startups
metadata.description: Cap table solutions, incentive plans, and much more for your startup
metadata.keywords: startup, sttok, captable, phantoms, incentives, beneficiaries

hero.title: Solution for Startups
hero.description: Digital management for Startups. Focus on growing your company and use Sttok for round calculations, incentive plans, shareholder register, meetings, etc...

features.title: All Features
features.description: Explore the features that make Sttok an essential tool for startups.

items.title: Official Shareholder Register
items.description: Easily manage and update your startup's shareholder register.

items.title: Incentive Plans
items.description: Manage stock options and phantoms, and give employees access to their incentives.

items.title: Meetings and Boards
items.description: Automate the management of shareholder meetings and boards with digital voting and proxy.

items.title: Operations Simulator
items.description: Calculate funding rounds and capital increases accurately and quickly.

items.title: Access for partners
items.description: If you want, you can give professional access to your investors

items.title: Syndication
items.description: Configure syndication easily to simplify your company's management

items.name: Lucía Bouzá
items.description: Sttok allows us to have all the information about partners and incentive plans centralized and updated. It facilitates the management of meetings and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Gerard Garcia
items.description: Sttok allows us to effectively manage employee incentive plans, shareholder register, operation simulations, and shareholder meetings.

items.name: Johan Longo
items.description: Sttok helps us keep all the information about partners, meetings, and incentive plans of our company organized. It facilitates the management of the cap table and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Nacho González
items.description: Now with Sttok you can perform simulations of capital increases or convertible notes. We also easily manage our team's phantom shares. Finally, as an investor, I have my investments organized and I clearly know what I have.
